mapper.select: SELECT P_ID planId, P_START planStart, P_END planEnd, P_CITY_ID planCityId, P_NAME planName FROM plan WHERE P_USER_ID = #{userId} AND P_Id = P_NO ORDER BY P_ID DESC
SELECT * FROM (SELECT P_ID FROM plan ORDER BY P_ID DESC) WHERE ROWNUM= 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plan(P_ID, P_NAME, P_START, P_END, P_NO, P_DAY, P_HOTEL_ID, P_USER_ID, P_PLACE_ID, P_RESTAURANT_ID, P_CITY_ID, P_START_ID) VALUES(#{planId}, #{planName}, to_date(#{planStart}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), to_date(#{planEnd}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), #{planNo}, #{planDay}, #{planHotelId}, #{planUserID}, #{planPlaceID}, #{planRestaurantId}, #{planCityId}, #{planStartId} )
